briefTitle: A Pilot Trial to Assess the Impact of Acupuncture on Post-mastectomy Pain, Nausea, Anxiety and Ability to Cope
officialTitle: A Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial to Assess the Impact of Acupuncture on Post-mastectomy Pain, Nausea, Anxiety and Ability to Cope.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Patients Eligible Compared to the Number Approached and Enrolled
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women
* 18 years or older
* Undergoing mastectomy surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-English speaking
* Pregnant
* Also undergoing an oophorectomy, TRAM or Latissimus flap surgery
